verses.verse: And there went <WH3212> a man <WH376> of the house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878>, and took <WH3947> to wife a daughter <WH1323> of Levi <WH3878>.

And the woman <WH802> conceived <WH2029>, and gave birth to <WH3205> a son <WH1121>: and when she saw <WH7200> him that he was a good <WH2896> child <WH6845>, she hid him three <WH7969> months <WH3391>.

And when she could <WH3201> not longer <WH5750> hide <WH6845> him <WH3947>, she took for him an ark <WH8392> of bulrushes <WH1573>, and coated <WH2560> it with tar <WH2564> and with pitch <WH2203>, and put <WH7760> the child <WH3206> in it and she laid <WH7760> it in the reeds <WH5488> by the river <WH2975>'s bank <WH8193>.
And his sister <WH269> stood <WH3320> afar off <WH7350>, to know <WH3045> what would be done to him <WH6213>.

And the daughter <WH1323> of Pharaoh <WH6547> came down <WH3381> to wash <WH7364> herself at the river <WH2975>; and her maidens <WH5291> walked <WH1980> along by the river <WH2975>'s side <WH3027>; and when she saw <WH7200> the ark <WH8392> among <WH8432> the reeds <WH5488>, she sent <WH7971> her maid <WH519> to fetch it <WH3947>.

And when she had opened <WH6605> it <WH7200>, she saw the child <WH3206>: and <WH5288>, behold, the baby cried <WH1058>. And she had compassion <WH2550> on him <WH559>, and said, This is one of the Hebrews <WH5680>' sons <WH3206>.

Then said <WH559> his sister <WH269> to Pharaoh <WH6547>'s daughter <WH1323>, Shall I go <WH3212> and call <WH7121> to you a nurse <WH3243> of the Hebrew <WH5680> women <WH802>, that she may nurse <WH3243> the child for you <WH3206>
And Pharaoh <WH6547>'s daughter <WH1323> said <WH559> to her <WH3212>, Go. And the maid <WH5959> went <WH3212> and called <WH7121> the child <WH3206>'s mother <WH517>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547>'s daughter <WH1323> said <WH559> unto her <WH3212>, Take this child <WH3206> away <WH3212>, and nurse <WH3243> it for me <WH5414>, and I will give you your wages <WH7939>. And the woman <WH802> took <WH3947> the child <WH3206>, and nursed it <WH5134>.

And the child <WH3206> grew <WH1431>, and she brought <WH935> him unto Pharaoh <WH6547>'s daughter <WH1323>, and he became her son <WH1121>. And she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Moses <WH4872>: and she said <WH559>, Because I drew <WH4871> him out of the water <WH4325>.

And it came to pass in those days <WH3117>, when Moses <WH4872> was grown <WH1431>, that he went out <WH3318> unto his brothers <WH251>, and looked <WH7200> on their burdens <WH5450>: and he spied <WH7200> an Egyptian <WH4713> striking <WH5221> an Hebrew <WH5680>, one of his brothers <WH251>.

And he looked <WH6437> this way <WH3541> and that way <WH3541>, and when he saw <WH7200> that there was no man <WH376>, he killed <WH5221> the Egyptian <WH4713>, and hid <WH2934> him in the sand <WH2344>.

And when he went out <WH3318> the second <WH8145> day <WH3117>, behold <WH8147>, two men <WH582> of the Hebrews <WH5680> argued <WH5327> together <WH559>: and he said to him that did the wrong <WH7563>, why strike <WH5221> you your fellow <WH7453>?

And he said <WH559>, Who made <WH7760> you <WH376> a prince <WH8269> and a judge <WH8199> over us <WH559>? intend you to kill <WH2026> me <WH2026>, as you killed the Egyptian <WH4713>? And Moses <WH4872> feared <WH3372>, and said <WH559>, Surely <WH403> this thing <WH1697> is known <WH3045>.

Now when Pharaoh <WH6547> heard <WH8085> this thing <WH1697>, he sought <WH1245> to kill <WH2026> Moses <WH4872>. But Moses <WH4872> fled <WH1272> from the face <WH6440> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Midian <WH4080>: and he sat down <WH3427> by a well <WH875>.

Now the priest <WH3548> of Midian <WH4080> had seven <WH7651> daughters <WH1323>: and they came <WH935> and drew <WH1802> water <WH4390>, and filled the troughs <WH7298> to water <WH8248> their father <WH1>'s flock <WH6629>.
And the shepherds <WH7462> came <WH935> and drove them away <WH1644>: but Moses <WH4872> stood up <WH6965> and helped <WH3467> them <WH8248>, and watered their flock <WH6629>.
And when they came <WH935> to Reuel <WH7467> their father <WH1>, he said <WH559>, How <WH4069> is it that you are come <WH935> so soon <WH4116> to day <WH3117>?

And they said <WH559>, An Egyptian <WH4713> delivered <WH5337> us out of the hand <WH3027> of the shepherds <WH7462>, and also drew <WH1802> water enough <WH1802> for us <WH8248>, and watered the flock <WH6629>.
And he said <WH559> unto his daughters <WH1323>, And where is he <WH5800>? why is it that you have left the man <WH376>? call <WH7121> him <WH398>, that he may eat bread <WH3899>.
And Moses <WH4872> was content <WH2974> to live <WH3427> with the man <WH376>: and he gave <WH5414> Moses <WH4872> Zipporah <WH6855> his daughter <WH1323>.
And she gave birth to <WH3205> him a son <WH1121>, and he called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Gershom <WH1647>: for he said <WH559>, I have been a stranger <WH1616> in a strange <WH5237> land <WH776>.

And it came to pass in process <WH1992> of time <WH3117>, that the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> died <WH4191>: and the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> sighed <WH584> by reason of <WH4480> the bondage <WH5656>, and they cried <WH2199>, and their cry <WH7775> came up <WH5927> unto God <WH430> by reason of the bondage <WH5656>.
And God <WH430> heard <WH8085> their groaning <WH5009>, and God <WH430> remembered <WH2142> his covenant <WH1285> with Abraham <WH85>, with Isaac <WH3327>, and with Jacob <WH3290>.
And God <WH430> looked <WH7200> upon the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and God <WH430> had respect unto them <WH3045>.
